mapper.insert: insert into study_member (email, password, nickname, name, tel, picture, point, joindate) values(#{email},#{password},#{nickname},#{name},#{tel},#{picture}, 50, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from study_member where email = #{value}
select count(*) from study_member where nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.update: update study_member set profile_intro = #{intro} where email=#{email}
update study_member set password = #{newPass} where email=#{email}
